title.rendered: 2020 Builder Brand Use Study Ranks Eldorado Stone First in Seven Categories

content.rendered:
SAN DIEGO, CA – Eldorado Stone, has once again been voted the number one brand for manufactured stone and brick veneer in BUILDER Magazine’s 2020 Brand Use Study. The annual survey of builders and general contractors, conducted by The Farnsworth Group, provides a critical snapshot of trade professionals’ familiarity with and usage of building products in a variety of categories. This is the fifth year in a row Eldorado Stone has been the top stone veneer manufacturer.

“Our team works diligently to enhance the design and construction experience by crafting products of the highest quality,” said Sarah Lograsso, Marketing Director. “We feel honored by this acknowledgment, because it reflects our commitment to providing trade professionals with superior stone and brick veneer profiles to ensure the best results for their projects.”

TWEET THIS:2020 @builderonline survey ranks @EldoradoStone No. 1 in seven #StoneVeneer and #Brick Veneer categories for fifth straight year. Learn more here: https://bit.ly/BuilderBrandStudy.

Eldorado Stone swept the ‘Manufactured Stone’ category in 2020, winning all four subcategories: Brand Familiarity, Brands Used in the Past Two Years, Brands Used Most and Quality Rating. The brand also ranked first in three out of four subcategories under ‘Siding: Brick and Brick Veneer.’ Survey participants cited product performance, price, ease of installation and brand reputation as the primary attributes that influenced their selections for manufactured stone and brick veneer products.

Download the Builder Brand Infographic Here.

To learn more about Eldorado Stone and its products, visit EldoradoStone.com. For more information on the 2020 BUILDER Brand Use Study and to download a copy, click here.

Related Links:

• Eldorado Stone website
• 2020 BUILDER Brand Use Study

About Eldorado Stone

Eldorado Stone, LLC is the manufacturer of the world’s most believable architectural stone veneer and is headquartered in San Marcos, California. For over 50 years, Eldorado Stone has demonstrated an undeniable passion for creating authentic products that elevate quality and design, including architectural stone and brick veneer. The company currently operates manufacturing facilities in several states with regional distribution centers across the U.S.

For more information and to view a gallery of beautiful installations, visit www.eldoradostone.com.
